record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I wish everyone a good night, and if there is no further business today, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 11:33 p.m., adjourned until Friday, August 3, 2007, at 9:30 a.m.
